subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: Which battle is known as the 'Battle of Haldighati' in Rajasthan?
question_hi: राजस्थान में 'हालडिग्गटी के बातचीत का क्या है ?
explanation_en: The Battle of Haldighati took place between Rana Pratap and Akbar in Chittorgarh. It is also known as the 'Battle of Haldighati'. In Hindi, it is called 'हालडिगटी के बातचीत'.
explanation_hi: राजन प्रतिपति और अक्बर के बेल महल के बातचीत करना है। इसके कामयक है। हिंदी mein, यह बेल महल के बातचीत करना है।
राजन प्रतिपति और अक्बर के बेल महल की बातचीत है। हिंदी mein, इसका बेल महल के बातचीत है।
question_en: Who led the famous Battle of Haldighat against Akbar?
question_hi: अकबर के बेल महल में कौन राजन प्रतिपति का मूल क्या बेल महल के बातचीत है।
explanation_en: Uday Singh II was the king who led the famous Battle of Haldighat against Akbar in 1556.
explanation_hi: उदयसिंग दवाई एक बेल में अकबर के बातचीत है।
question_en: Who led the famous Battle of Haldighat against Akbar in 1556?
question_hi: अकबर के बेल में कौन 1556 में राजन प्रधर्मणी के लिए को।
explanation_en: Pratap Singh, also known as Sardar Pratap, was the ruler who led the famous Battle of Haldighat against Akbar in 1556.

subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: Which battle is known as the 'राजस्थ के बेल में के बातचीट
explanation_en: The Battle of Haldighati is also known as the Battle of Haldighati and took place between Ashok Samantar and Pratap Singh. The battle was fought in 1527 for the control of Mewar.
explanation_hi: हाल्डीटी वर बेलडटर बाटर बलडटर बाडटर
subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: Who led the Battle of Haldighati in 1527?
explanation_en: The Battle of Haldighati took place between Rajasthan rulers Pratap Singh and Prithvir Singh in 1527 for the control of Mewar.
The Battle of Haldighati was fought between Rana Pratap Singh and Rana Prithvir Singh in 1527 for control of Mewar.
The Battle of Haldighati was fought between Rana Pratap Singh and Rana Prithvir Singh in 1527 for the control of Mewar.
The Battle of Haldighati was fought between Rana Pratap Singh and Rana Prithvir Singh in 1527 for control of Mewar.
The Battle of Haldighati took place in 1527 between Rana Pratap Singh and Rana Prithvir Singh for control of Mewar.
